description: The women's Viva 45 is here to breathe some life into your backpacking carry with its exceptional fit and a simple, clean design that experts and greenhorns alike can appreciate. Highly adjustable, the Viva 45 is a panel load workhorse, ready to tackle overnight weekends and weeklong trips alike. The large J-zip opening provides remarkable access to your gear while an included raincover help keep everything dry should your adventure turn soggy. Its AirScape® suspension provides a close-to-body, breathable, stable fit that bears the burden for you. Made with 100% recycled materials
name: Viva 45 - Womens
